â€œThis is a quality strain. Great smell, burns nicely, not too harsh, and provides a nice energetic high, but not twitchy. The way I'd describe the feeling is relaxed rejuvenation.â€

â€œVery citrusy smell to accompany the beautiful orange highlights in this dense bud. Sweet taste highlighted with citrus. Mellow high that sets in throughout the body, while sharpening your attention and focus. Perfect for any time of dayâ€
â€œVery nice high, left a nice lemony taste in my mouth. I felt really creative. Went to work and was able to function.â€
â€œMakes me feel really good. Leaves a nice citrus/lemon taste in your mind. I love it.â€

â€œThe fragrance of this bud is amazing and the taste is unreal! It's very lemony and smooth. 

The high is a unique one being a hybrid you feel the effects of both parents. Sometimes a burst of energy and then some moments where you need to sit and chill... a cool high.â€
â€œSome of the most vibrant and odd feelings with this high. great for going outdoors and just exploring.â€

The Lemon haze comes through with a nice head high. Great for sta...â€
